programme.desc: This is a talent reality show gathering different talents to perform under various themes. Nicholas Tse, G.E.M., Meng Fei, and Annie Yi are invited to explore the outstanding talents and stories from their professional knowledge and perspectives.

programme.title: Love Never Comes Late Season 2 Ep9
programme.desc: A dating program designed for singles or divorced people who have passed the age of marriage. 4 male guests and 3 female guests would join the one-to-one communication in sequence per episode. The guests who are under the stage would be arranged to a room, to communicate more and deepen their understanding with each other. Love never comes late!

programme.title: Ace Actress Ep7
programme.desc: As the first reality show about training and selecting actresses in ancient clothing, Angie Chiu, Tamia Liu, Zhang Xiao Long, Joseph Cheng, Aarif Rahman, and Kevin Yan would choose the Ace Actress through various acting exams and professional guidance.

programme.title: Wonderland Ep3
programme.desc: 15 artists, including Shu Qi, Song Dan Dan, and Lai Kuan Lin, are invited to live together for 21 days in the “Wonderland” which is 50km away from Beijing. They are looking for a new and enjoyable lifestyle through living in groups.

programme.title: City All In Tribe Ep4
programme.desc: A reality show to invite Dylan Wang, Justin Huang, Victor Qin, Hani Kyzy with other guests as “urban team” to explore the cities around. They will play via games and challenges for audience to know more about the cities. What a good energetic and humorous way to discover the local charismas.

programme.title: The Pride Of Hunan Cuisine Ep1
programme.desc: To understand the way of Hunan living, it becomes easier to expound by various food cultures such as rice, snacks, especially spicy food. It can present the most real Hunan with vivid images.

programme.title: The Decade Ep3
programme.desc: The documentary records the “Decade Witnesses” who participate on national infrastructure and construction, experienced great changes on profound modification.

programme.title: Masked Dancing King 2022 (Repackaged) Ep4
programme.desc: New interpretation and concept to show the national dancing culture! Masked Dancing King 2022 gathered those fantastic dance-lovers and celebrities in this show. programme.title: Perfect Match (2017) Ep48
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. programme.title: The Delicacy Season 2 Ep10

programme.title: The Lucky 2% Ep3
programme.desc: This is the first reality show about helping and rescuing the strays. Guests from different fields are invited to become volunteers in the animal welfare center, to provide the stray animals with treatment and love, and finally find suitable adopters for them.

programme.title: Singing With Legends Season 4 Ep7
programme.desc: The show has served as a bridge that connects veteran and young singers via various popular songs. Priscilla Chan, Yang Kun, Steve Chou, Qi Zhang, Jam Hsiao, An Youqi, Lu Hu, Hui Yuan Meng, Ma Jiaqi, etc. are invited for the pairing section. They all raised audiences’ interest by introducing unexpected changes to the way music that performed.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep799800
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3346
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2497
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep880
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep801802
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44924493
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1757
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3346

There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2497
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep880
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep26
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep3334
programme.desc:
The name “Kaohsiung” has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from “Da Gou”. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiung’s [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiung’s century-old history.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep420
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Back To Home (M) Ep1011
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep880
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep880
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep1026
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep760761
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep643
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep421
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Piggy's Counter-Attack (M) Ep4849
programme.desc: A rich father, who built his fortune from nothing, goes bankrupt overnight when his investments fail. His children are knocked out of heaven and have to launch a counterattack.

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can was once a top general but choose to return to his hometown to study martial arts and enjoy family time with his wife and son. However, his wife was killed and the family became victims of conspiracies. Su was heartbroken and wandered like a beggar with his son. One day, he met the "God of Martial Arts" and learnt Drunken Fist from him.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Meow
programme.desc: Earth has always been home to the aliens called Meow since ancient times. This species has now transformed into ordinary cats living among humans all over the world. Xi Xi Li is the last Meow who comes to Earth with the intention of invading it. However, his plan gets derailed when a family in Hong Kong takes him in as a pet.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: As The Light Goes Out
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve in Hong Kong, a Team of firefighters battle an out-of-control warehouse fire that threatens to plunge the entire city into darkness. The team must put their differences aside and come together for an ultimate battle to stop the fire spreading to a nearby power plant.

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: Lee Seung is a hopeful and idealistic new hire at a billion-dollar company. However, he soon finds that this new world is more complicated than he thought, with a myriad of illicit relationships, including one between the company chairman and the CEO, and the cutthroat world of finance laid bare before his eyes as the company prepares to go public.

programme.title: The Founding of an Army
programme.desc: The epic story behind the founding of the People’s Liberation Army in China that ultimately laid the foundation for a new republic, featuring a star-studded cast of Chinese actors including Liu Ye, Zhu Yawen, and more!

programme.title: Zombiology: Enjoy Yourself Tonight
programme.desc: Two eccentric young men deem themselves as heroes who can save the earth. While they feel frustrated in real life, a zombie from their favourite animation suddenly appears in Hong Kong, turning people into zombies and causing widespread chaos, the young men decide to take on the responsibility and fight the battle against the zombies!

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A boy’s marriage proposal was rejected by the girl and the lovers separated. Nonetheless, they agree on a break-up contract stating that if both are single in five years they will get married. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Dr. Wai in the Scripture with No
programme.desc: "The Scripture With No Words" had been lost for a long time. Everybody was eager to find it, even the ambitious Japanese. Dr. Wai, a former antiquarian, went to Shanghai trying to locate "The Scripture With No Words" and he discovered that it was in the possession of the leader of "Gang of Salt". And the game begin...

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her father’s death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late father’s hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Mari Hirakawa inherits her father’s dojo after his death but wants to sell it as she does not want to run the karate practice. For her plan to succeed, she has to take on a bet with his father’s ex-student and compete in a martial arts competition that will change her life.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: Wallace, an old gang member, is tasked to kill the son of a mob boss, Robert. Gathering his team for the job, the six of them set out to hunt Robert down. However, when the mission goes horribly wrong, Wallace later finds out that it was all a set-up to flush out a mole in his team…

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: After “Golden Chickenesss”, this is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Wolf Warrior II
programme.desc: In this action-packed sequel to the 2015 blockbuster hit, China’s deadliest Special Forces operative, Leng Feng (Wu Jing), returns into action when he crosses paths with a sadistic band of mercenaries terrorizing innocent civilians.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow III
programme.desc: In this prequel, young Mark heads to Saigon to find his cousin Mun and meets a female gang leader Kit, who teaches him gun skills. Kit falls for Mark but Mark knows Mun also loves her so he did not reciprocate her love. The return of Kit’s ex-boyfriend brings this love triangle to a head after he bombs Mun’s garage, forcing her to sort things out.

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: Bai Xing Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel located in Qian Dao Lake, Hang Zhou, with a service level only worthy of a four-star hotel. The head office sent Cruella Koo, a tough executive, to lead reforms for the hotel and upgrade the employees’ performance to reach the five-star level.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: The former SWAT captain, Dong Gu, suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: One of the most far-out, fantastical films ever made in Chinese movie history, this pays tribute to the Japanese superhero trend in the 1970s. It tells the story of the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan, who is transformed from a young lab researcher to a superhero battling the crazy and ambitious monsters of the ice age.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill’s nieces!

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - “Black Leopard”. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of “Black Leopard”, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperor’s tomb.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Bells of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read Ching Dynasty novel, this touching love story has proven a challenge to many filmmakers, and it is acclaimed as the most successful one. A sumptuous feature that took three years of planning and production, it was a hugely popular and critiqued hit which stands out as a classic combination of both 18th century literature and 1960s moviemaking.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Li Ching plays, Ah Chiao, a girl from a rural village stranded in the city, who befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are all poor, but Ah Chiao’s fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she ultimately learns money can't buy happiness.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: Rape of the Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lin’s sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar known as 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and tries to steal a diamond from a rich man’s party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chief’s granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70’s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister’s magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: In attempting to rescue some innocent people, swordsman Chiang Tzu-chao (Fang Mien) slays the son of Tsao Kang (Wang Hsia), leader of the ruthless Crimson Charm gang.The enraged father promises vengeance on the day of Chiang's 60th birthday...

programme.title: Lady Of Steel
programme.desc: A young swordswoman Fang Ying Qi sets out to join the Flying Dragon Clan in their defense against the invading Jin forces. Fang also intends to avenge the murder of her parents by bandit leader Han 20 years ago. Han has since taken on a false identity as a member of the Flying Dragon Clan and Fang must rely on her deadly sword skills to stop Han.

programme.title: The Web of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called “Five Poison Web”, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit’s camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader’s wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government’s secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor’s ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family’s young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo’s stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fiancé to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yen’s property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love…

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all the disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone in the temple except five Shaolin disciples. To take revenge on the Qing’s, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become “The Five Shaolin Masters”.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Yaman
programme.desc: After losing his father to a bunch of scheming politicians, a young man decides to wade into the corrupt and unscrupulous world of politics to avenge his death.

programme.title: Ivan Kavalkaran
programme.desc: Ivan Kavalkaran is the story of Vijay (Bellamkonda Srinivas) a sincere and dynamic police officer who gets stuck in a kidnap case which turns his life upside down as the entire department and society turns against him. He has 24 hours to prove his innocence and get back to his respectable life. Will he be able to do that?

programme.title: Irandam Ulagaporin Kadaisi Gundu
programme.desc: A lorry driver ends up in possession of an unexploded bomb that is being sought after by both the cops and pro-peace activists.

programme.title: Achamindri
programme.desc: Sakthi, a pickpocket, and Sathya, a police officer, must work together to find out who is responsible for a series of deaths and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Ivan Thanthiran
programme.desc: Two engineering dropouts stumble upon the activities of a corrupt education minister owning engineering colleges and expose him. The minister wants revenge and launches a manhunt for them. The cat-and-mouse game begins.

programme.title: Endrendrum Punnagai
programme.desc: Goutham grows up hating women after his mother abandons him during his childhood. Though he decides to stay single while his friends marry, Priya changes his mind about singlehood.

programme.title: Sethupathy
programme.desc: Sethupathi, a tough police officer, investigates the murder of an inspector. His findings lead to the arrest of Vathiyar, an influential man in Madurai, but put his life, career and family at risk.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.

programme.title: Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu
programme.desc: Aravind unexpectedly loses his beloved girlfriend in a car accident. The strangest thing happens after the accident when people around him tell him no such person ever existed.

programme.title: Maragadha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Naan Sirithal
programme.desc: Gandhi, who suffers from Pseudobulbar, finds his life turned upside down when he gets in trouble with Dilli Babu, a gangster.
Dr.Vaseegaran is forced to reassemble Chitti in order to stop a deadly winged monster.

programme.title: Kallan
programme.desc: Velu, a man who belongs to a family of hunters, comes up with an illegal way to make good money when the government puts a ban on hunting as a profession.

programme.title: Oru Pakka Kathai
programme.desc: The marriage of Meera, a college student, and her boyfriend Saravanan has been approved by the family. But the condition is as after a job after graduation. But when Meera becomes pregnant, the whole story gets upside down

programme.title: Adhe Kangal
programme.desc: Varun Murali, a blind chef and owner of a restaurant, falls in love with his customer Deepa. However, his life takes an unusual turn after he realises the truth about her.

programme.title: Dikkilona
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Soodhu Kavvum
programme.desc: Das, with his team, kidnap Arumai, son of a politician, who has been planning his own kidnapping to extract money from his father. Problems arise, when an insane cop is brought to handle the case.

programme.title: Karnan
programme.desc: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

programme.title: Anandam Vilayudum Veedu
programme.desc: While Muthupandi and Kaasi, two half-brothers, lead harmonious lives with their large families, their formidable unity is threatened by the evil scheme of an old nemesis.

programme.title: Irumbu Thirai
programme.desc: A military officer borrows money from a bank using fake papers for his sister's marriage. However, when the money goes missing from his account, he begins an investigation that leads him to a hacker.

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: After her family forces her to get married, Kavya runs away from her house. When her brother goes in search of her, he finds her with a young man and assumes him to be her boyfriend.

programme.desc: Sagar, Sam and Aarav decide to dive underwater to find treasure in a sunken ship in order to help Sam clear his debt. However, one of them has a hidden agenda of his own.

programme.title: Ram Aur Shyam
programme.desc: Ram escapes from his home when he learns that his abusive brother-in-law plans to kill him. Justice is meted out when Shyam, Ram's long-lost twin, accidentally takes his place.

programme.title: Lailaa O Lailaa
programme.desc: Jai, special investigative agent, falls in love with Anjali and marries her. When he struggles to get hold of Victor Rana, a terrorist on the loose, he asks his wife for her help.

programme.title: Lailaa O Lailaa
programme.desc: Jai, special investigative agent, falls in love with Anjali and marries her. When he struggles to get hold of Victor Rana, a terrorist on the loose, he asks his wife for her help.

programme.title: Judwaa
programme.desc: Twin brothers Raja and Prem Malhotra get separated at birth but are reunited by fate to defeat Ratanlal, a local gangster, who wants to destroy the Malhotra family.

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
programme.desc: Dushant, an aspiring singer, is encouraged by Jaya to achieve his dreams. However, after Dushant becomes successful, his other friends try to create misunderstandings between him and Jaya.

programme.title: Kapoor & Sons
programme.desc: Brothers Arjun and Rahul return home to visit their ailing grandfather. Amidst numerous ongoing family problems, emotions get intensified when a girl causes a rift between the two.

programme.title: Mera Shapath
programme.desc: Babu leaves home to stay with his three friends in Hyderabad. Their friendship is tested after Babu and his friends are framed for a robbery which they did not commit.

programme.title: MLA Kattappa
programme.desc: A man rises to the position of the chief minister of a state despite all the hurdles in his way. Once there, the road ahead seems no less difficult.

programme.title: What The Fish
programme.desc: Sudha hands over the responsibility of her house and pet fish to her niece's fiance before leaving for a holiday. When she returns, all seems fine until she opens the bathroom door.

programme.title: Real Winner
programme.desc: Frustrated with Shakti's rebellious nature, his parents send him to stay at his grandparents' house where he falls in love with Neelima. But he is shocked to learn that her marriage is already fixed.

programme.title: Singh Saab The Great
programme.desc: Singh Saab is a responsible tax collector who believes in honesty, but Bhoodev, a conniving man, plots against him. Singh adopts a unique way to teach Bhoodev a lesson.

programme.title: Khoobsurat
programme.desc: In a desperate attempt to save himself and Gudia, Sanju enters the Chaudhary household by posing as their NRI relative to swindle money from them.

programme.title: Deewane Huye Paagal
programme.desc: After witnessing a murder committed by a gangster, Tanya flees to Dubai. Karan, who loves her, goes after her only to realise that she is pursued by a few more suitors and the gangster himself.

programme.title: Deewane Huye Paagal
programme.desc: After witnessing a murder committed by a gangster, Tanya flees to Dubai. Karan, who loves her, goes after her only to realise that she is pursued by a few more suitors and the gangster himself.

programme.title: Saajan Bina Suhagan
programme.desc: Asha is in love with Raj but her dying father begs her to marry another man. Years later, Raj walks back into her idyllic life throwing everything off balance.

programme.title: Oh Darling Yeh Hai India
programme.desc: A gangster plans to take over the country by replacing the president with a lookalike. A man and woman, who are complete strangers, get wind of this conspiracy and try to save the country.

programme.title: OK Jaanu
programme.desc: Adi and Tara are ambitious people who fall in love after meeting at a wedding. They decide on a no-strings-attached live-in relationship, but doubt their decision when their careers pull them apart.

programme.title: Nagin Bani Suhagan
programme.desc: Vaishali, an ardent devotee of Lord Shiva, is blessed with a boon to transform herself into a shapeshifting snake. She falls in a dilemma when circumstances force her to go against her own love.

programme.title: Doshi
programme.desc: Bruce Lee's life falls in danger when he accidentally takes a photo of a murder committed by a gangster, Ramdoss. Later, Ramdoss kidnaps Bruce Lee's lover, Saroja, in exchange for all the evidence.

programme.title: Beqabu
programme.desc: Raja helps imprison a terrorist who then murders him. Years later, Raja's girlfriend comes across his lookalike in Nepal and decides to find the truth.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Born as an 80-year-old man in New Orleans just after World War I, Benjamin Button proceeds to grow younger as time passes. And unable to stop time like any other man, Benjamin experiences life and love oddly out of sync with the rest of humanity. This Academy Award winning film is a time traveller's tale of the people and places Benjamin encounters, the loves he loses and finds, as well as the joys of life and the sadness of death and what lasts beyond time.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2 6
programme.desc: An unexpected trio emerges in the mission to take down Cortés, as Arman and Nadia’s relationship hits a breaking point. Fiona attempts to keep her family safe.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 13
programme.desc: Sheldon worries his comfortable lifestyle is preventing him from achieving scientific progress so he asks his friends to make him miserable.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 14
programme.desc: When an online bully destroys Leonard and Sheldon's physics paper, the guys band together to take him down.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 15

programme.desc: When the gang hears about an experiment designed to make participants fall in love, Sheldon and Penny put it to the test as a joke.

programme.title: Godzilla: King Of The Monsters
programme.desc: The story follows the heroic efforts of the crypto-zoological agency Monarch as its members face off against a battery of god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah. When these ancient super-species—thought to be mere myths—rise again, they all vie for supremacy, leaving humanity’s very existence hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner unearths a long buried secret...

programme.title: The Mentalist S7 02

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 1
programme.desc: In the wealthy, seaside community of Neptune, the rich and powerful make the rules. They own the town and the high school, and they desperately try to keep their dirty little secrets just that...secret. Unfortunately for them, there's Veronica Mars (series star KRISTEN BELL), a smart, fearless 17-year-old apprentice private investigator dedicated to solving the town's toughest mysteries.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 2
programme.desc: Veronica and Wallace don't believe in the evidence against Weevil, who has been arrested for stealing credit card applications from Logan's family, and launch an investigation to help their new ally. Meanwhile, after joining Ms. Mallory Dent's (series star SYDNEY TAMIIA POITIER) journalism class, Veronica clashes with socialite Caitlin Ford (PARIS HILTON - "The Simple Life 2"), Logan's sexy new girlfriend. The young investigator is intrigued by the attention shown to her by another wealthy student, Troy Vandegraff (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), a friend of her ex-boyfriend Duncan. Later, Veronica learns that Lilly got a ticket while driving her car on the day she died--two hours after her supposed time of death.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 2

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 4
programme.desc: In an effort to help Wallace's new friend, Georgia (KYLA PRATT), who was duped out of her money in an Internet scheme, Veronica must outwit a group of computer "thugs," known as the Silicon Mafia. Meanwhile, Keith makes Veronica introduce him to her new boyfriend, Troy (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), before allowing her to go to the homecoming dance with him. Later, Logan helps Duncan edit together a memorial video for a school dedication ceremony marking the one-year anniversary of Lilly's death.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 5
programme.desc: Veronica tries to help her new boyfriend, Troy (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), find his father's stolen car and turns to Weevil for assistance. But the situation becomes dangerous when she discovers that Logan and Troy's buddy might have leftmore than a piñata in the car after their night in Tijuana. While Keith has accepted that his wife is gone and begins dating school guidance counselor Rebecca James (recurring guest star PAULA MARSHALL), Veronica continues to secretly investigateher mother's whereabouts, leading her to stumble on a secret her mom was keeping.

programme.title: Life As We Know It
programme.desc: Life As We Know It Grey's Anatomy's Katherine Heigl and Transformers' Josh Duhamel play polar opposites Holly and Eric. After a disastrous first date, the only thing they have in common is their dislike for each other and their love for their goddaughter, Sophie. But when they suddenly become all Sophie has in the world, they are forced to put their differences aside. Juggling career ambitions and competing social calendars, they'll have to find some common ground while living under one roof-- and deal with life as we know it. Directed by Greg Berlanti (Brothers and Sisters, Dawson's Creek), this romantic drama also features Mad Men's Christina Hendricks and more.

programme.desc: When The Fat Lady Sings - Jessica becomes involved in a double-murder investigation when she attends an opera opening with old friend Dennis Stanton (Keith Michell) in San Francisco.

programme.title: Little House: Look Back To Yesterday
programme.desc: Little House: Look Back To Yesterday - Medical student Albert returns to Walnut Grove only to face a potentially fatal blood disease. Looking back to better days at home, Albert gains strength and with courage survives his disease.

programme.title: Little House: Bless All The Dear Children
programme.desc: Little House: Bless All The Dear Children - Laura and Almanzo went looking for Rose who was kidnapped. Watch as a young orphan looks for a home and a wish by Jason Carter to give his mother a happy Christmas are all part of this wonderful story.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep05
programme.desc: The Joker Is A Card - When Samantha's peaceful dinner is ruined by Endora's jokes, her Uncle Arthur came for a visit. Arthur teaches Darrin a spell to teach Endora a lesson.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep06
programme.desc: Take Two Aspirins And Half A Pint Of Porpoise Milk - Samantha gets sick and loses her powers after coming into contact with black Peruvian roses. Aunt Clara sends Darrin off to gather items for the antidote.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Trick Or Treat - Endora wants Samantha to go away with her to celebrate a Halloween ceremony but Darrin wants Samantha at home to host a party for a potential new client.

programme.title: Cheers S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Endless Slumper - Sam loans out his lucky cap to a baseball player who’s in a slump.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep04
programme.desc: The Error Of Her Ways - The puzzling suicide of a woman (Kathy Cannon) who has been charged with her husband's murder prompts Jessica (Angela Lansbury) to question her guilt.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep05
programme.desc: Jack and Bill - When Jessica's private-eye friend (Ken Howard) agrees to dog-sit, he finds himself involved in murder and an attempted assassination.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep01
programme.desc: Marooned, The Search, Isaac's Holiday Part 1 - Isaac (Ted Lange) is on vacation and decides to go on the cruise, as a passenger. He acts like a jerk and hooks up with another passenger (Lola Falana) and doesn't tell her what he does. Among the other passengers is a woman (Donna Mills), searching for her birth mother, who is also on the cruise, and she wants to go see her but is too afraid to. She meets another passenger (David Birney) and they hit it off. A rich girl (Barbi Benton), who just got dumped at the altar, is very mean and Doc (Bernie Kopell) sets out to help her. A couple (Edie Adams and Avery Schreiber) who are in a rut and are considering separating

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep02
programme.desc: Marooned, The Search, Isaac's Holiday Part 2 - Conclusion. The captain (Gavin MacLeod) and his marooned group struggle to survive on the island during a hurricane; the woman (Donna Mills) looking for her birth mother (Laraine Day) makes a startling discovery; and Isaacs (Ted Lange) tries to save the ship from the storm, while trying to regain Mara (Lola Falana)'s trust.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep03
programme.desc: Rocky/ Julie's Dilemma/ Who's Who - Tomboy Rosemary "Rocky" Simpson (Melissa Gilbert) has a shipboard romance with teenager Norman (Jimmy Baio); Julie's (Lauren Tewes) parents (Betty Garrett and Norman Fell) break the news that they are getting a divorce; two prudes, Marion (James Coco) and Patricia (Dody Goodman), are booked into the same cabin, because Marion is a man who has a female name.

programme.title: I Dream of Jeannie S2 Ep28
programme.desc: My Master, Napolean's Buddy - Tony can't change the course of history when Jeannie takes him to Napoleon's court.

programme.title: I Dream of Jeannie S2 Ep29
programme.desc: The Birds And The Bees Bit - Jeannie and Tony's plan to elope meets with strange opposition.

programme.title: I Dream of Jeannie S2 Ep30
programme.desc: My Master, The Swinging Bachelor - When Tony doesn't invite Jeannie to dinner, she bakes a cake with strange effects on the guests.

programme.title: I Dream of Jeannie S2 Ep31
programme.desc: The Mod Party - Dr. Bellows schedules a meeting on the night of Roger's mod party.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep01
programme.desc: Pilot - Douglas “Doogie” Howser is a boy genius. Suffering from acute leukemia, Doogie shows an incredible deftness for medicine, compassion, and knowledge; he is a doctor in every sense of the word.

programme.title: Airwolf S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Shadow Of The Hawke - Part I - Michael Archangel, a CIA project director, enlists Vietnam veteran Stringfellow Hawke and Dominic Santini to recover Airwolf, a state-of-the-art helicopter which is a tool in the Mid-Eastern struggle.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep01
programme.desc: Valhalley of the Dolls Part I - Phoebe and Paige search for Leo after Paige accidentally causes a "chipper" Piper to have amnesia, but the sisters soon learn he is being held on the mythical Island of Valhalla.

But, what he doesn't know, is that they're friends and traveling together. The Captain's (Gavin MacLeod) godson (Grant Goodeve) brings his wife (Bess Armstrong) on the cruise for a belated honeymoon, because he was called to military service and was away for two years. Two brothers (Sonny Bono and Marty Ingels) come on board to sue the cruise line, by having one of them fake an injury. The crew suspects he's faking but, unless they can get him to stand up, they're at the brothers' mercy.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep175
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.desc: Unreasonable Doubt - The team races to stop an active serial killer after three women are found weighted down at the bottom of a lake, and Jubal looks into an old closed case after there are multiple similarities to the recent victims.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Liar's Poker - When the leader of a drug cartel and one of the world’s most wanted men, Antonio Vargas , is apprehended by the team, the entire FBI headquarters is put at risk when his henchmen unveil a terroristic threat to free him.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Crazy Love - A shooting at a quinceañera leaves two dead, but the team believes they may not have been the intended targets.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Clean Slate - As the team searches for a young girl who was kidnapped from a cabin during a family vacation, they discover that the abduction may be tied to a skeleton in her family’s closet.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Uncovered - The team must infiltrate a drug trafficking gang after the robbery of a chemical plant leaves two customs agents dead. Also, Nestor (Josh Segarra) offers his help on the case, giving Maggie new insight into his character

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Discord - An experience on the job has new agent Tiffany Wallace examining the tension between her career as an FBI special agent and the responsibility she feels to her community as a black woman.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Walk The line - After a bomb leaves three people dead, the team presses a reluctant informant to gather information from his close friends who are under suspicion.

programme.desc: Part 2. As the she-wolf moves across the Alps her path crosses many animals who have made this land their home, from the bear to the golden eagle.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superfactories S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cars, chips, toys and toilets. Behind the scenes at Maserati, Frito-Lay, Bandai and Armitage Shanks, we see how these useful products are innovatively produced.

programme.title: The Lakes with Simon Reeve S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the shadows of Sellafield, the most hazardous industrial site in western Europe, Simon meets members of the Civil Nuclear Constabulary, an elite unit of armed police that is the UK's first line of defence against an attack at a nuclear site. He is also given rare access to Sellafield's aging facilities.

programme.title: Universe S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Milky Way: Island of Light - Professor Brian Cox journeys across the vastness of time and space.

programme.title: The Sanctuary: Survival Stories of The Alps S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Part 2. As the she-wolf moves across the Alps her path crosses many animals who have made this land their home, from the bear to the golden eagle.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Unseen Adventures S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In the first instalment Joanna explores the incredible islands of Japan, before jumping on board the Trans-Siberian Railway into Russia.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep5
programme.desc: In the US a man and his dog take cover as a rare tornado outbreak rips through towns on the East coast. In Norway, a boxer has the fight of his life when a swim under the ice goes disastrously wrong and in Western Australia, a homeowner is in a faceoff with the flames.

programme.title: Attenborough and The Mammoth Graveyard S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough joins an archaeological dig uncovering Britain's biggest mammoth discovery in almost 20 years. In 2017, in a gravel quarry near Swindon, two amateur fossil hunters found an extraordinary cache of Ice Age mammoth remains. Could the Neanderthals have killed these Ice Age giants?

programme.title: Wild Metropolis S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Residents - Cities may seem unlikely havens for wildlife, but for animals able to adapt, the urban world is filled with opportunity. This first episode examines what it takes for wild animals to thrive in the fastest changing habitat on the planet.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Auckland - Auckland: the largest and most coastal city in New Zealand. Few cities in the world have a stronger claim to the title "City of Volcanoes" - so can Neil find a Kiwi Pompeii?

programme.title: Coastal Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Welsh Pembrokeshire - Robson travels around the Welsh Pembrokeshire coast where he goes in search of Seabass.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Africa - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of Africa - home to the greatest wildlife gatherings on Earth. But even in this land of plenty, wildlife faces huge challenges.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lightning - In Arizona, lightning strikes from so high above the ground, through such clear air, that it creates the perfect conditions for the most electrifying show on Earth. To uncover how and when they happen, witness a cloud-fall on Table Mountain in South Africa, climb a frozen waterfall in the Alps and visit the wildflower blooms of the South African veldt.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Remarkable Reptiles Ep4
programme.desc: Africa - a continent teeming with life. While its animal aristocrats are the most familiar, lurking in the shadows is a diversity of reptiles. They’ve conquered just about every habitat and have evolved a remarkable array of adaptations that make them the undisputed masters of the underworld.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Crocodile Capers Ep6
programme.desc: Strap in for Dr. Amanda’s risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, who’s headed back to the wild.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - South America Ep7
programme.desc: From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Risk and Reward Ep3
programme.desc: The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits Ep6
programme.desc: Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Remarkable Reptiles Ep4

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Risk and Reward Ep3
programme.desc: The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - Leaving Home Ep2
programme.desc: An ancient citadel once home to Sri Lanka’s kings has now been reclaimed by the jungle… and there’s a new dynasty in power. Monkeys.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Southeast Asia Ep8
programme.desc: With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill – on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits Ep6
programme.desc: Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Remarkable Reptiles Ep4
programme.desc: Africa - a continent teeming with life. While its animal aristocrats are the most familiar, lurking in the shadows is a diversity of reptiles. They’ve conquered just about every habitat and have evolved a remarkable array of adaptations that make them the undisputed masters of the underworld.

programme.desc: Strap in for Dr. Amanda’s risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, who’s headed back to the wild.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - USA Ep9
programme.desc: The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Europe Ep10
programme.desc: From the Highlands to the Alps, Europe’s evocative landscapes are the backdrop for epic wildlife drama. Normally stoic red deer go wild during the rut. Wolf packs clash over territory, and foxes do the foxtrot - it’s not as nice as it sounds.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - Winter is Coming Ep1
programme.desc: As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where it’s warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - Meadow of Horror Ep2
programme.desc: It is horror! It is murder! Brutal death as well as exciting fights with an exceptional last-minute rescue. And after seeing it – you will know the creepiest spot is actually the meadow in your neighborhood. With stylistic devices from the horror genre this extraordinary nature documentary takes you on a journey following a well-known hero with six legs, red wings and seven black dots through a seemingly normal meadow – but full of monsters.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - God's Darling: Beetles Ep3
programme.desc: Beetles have inhabited the Earth for more than 240 million years. There are around 380,000 kinds of beetles known to scientists and every year hundreds of new species are discovered. One fourth of the world’s animals are beetles. They have conquered almost every corner and every habitat on the planet and they have survived every global disaster. What is it that makes them so successful?

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - The Drakensberg: Barrier of Spears Ep1
programme.desc: This documentary looks at the wildlife of The Drakensberg Mountain range. We take a look at how creatures survive in the hostile landscape, from the highest peaks to the rolling grasslands below.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Drought Begins Ep1
programme.desc: The Luangwa Valley in Zambia experiences one of the toughest dry seasons imaginable. Seven months with no rain and spiraling temperatures. And with this year’s El Nino conditions the drought is threatening to be even more intense than usual.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - Life in the Furnace Ep2
programme.desc: It’s October in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Niño event… the Valley is in the throes of drought. There’s been no rain since April and desperate animals are drawn to the only remaining source of water in the Valley – the dwindling Luangwa River. The last remaining deep pools are inhabited by hippos – hundreds squashed together in the only water deep enough to submerge them. As tempers flare and skirmishes break out, it’s a dangerous place for baby hippos, dwarfed by the three-tonne adults.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Coming of the Rains Ep3
programme.desc: The rains are late. It is the most brutal time of year. Babies born into drought face starvation. Everything is desperate for rain. When it arrives, it is a downpour on an enormous scale. Alien creatures emerge into a different world. The wet season begins.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - USA Ep9
programme.desc: The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Invisible World Ep3
programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 - Sweeping Shores Ep1
programme.desc: The African intertidal zone is home to a unique universe of plants and creatures. Here, life has adapted to survive in a challenging marine environment - some species are able to live on exposed rocks, while others prefer the shelter of rock pools.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 - Sanctuary of the Indian Ocean Ep2
programme.desc: On Africa's east coast, the warm Agulhas run south with a distinctive subtropical landscape. Made up of everything from mangrove swamps to colorful coral reefs, the area has marine turtles - who breed on long and warm sandy beaches - and a recently found population of "living fossils", the Coelacanth, which dwell in deep, submarine canyons.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Europe Ep10
programme.desc: From the Highlands to the Alps, Europe’s evocative landscapes are the backdrop for epic wildlife drama. Normally stoic red deer go wild during the rut. Wolf packs clash over territory, and foxes do the foxtrot - it’s not as nice as it sounds.

programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean.
